solution_line_template: The farmer has {female_cows_count} female cows because {total_cows} x {female_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_cows}*{female_percentage_decimal}={female_cows_count}>>{female_cows_count}

The farmer will get {total_milk_per_day} gallons of milk a day because {female_cows_count} x {milk_per_female_cow} = <<{female_cows_count}*{milk_per_female_cow}={total_milk_per_day}>>{total_milk_per_day}
